item.description: About Stefanni Brasil - The Kind Developer

item.title: How to Become Confident - Tips & Books
item.description: I believed I had to had born confident. And I wasn’t, so why keep trying? How happy I am to have been wrong about that! This post brings some tips from the book “The Confidence Code: The Science and Art of Self-Assurance - What women should know”. And some lessons from my Cognitive Behaviour Therapy sessions. Ready? üöÄ How to practice Self-Confidence When in doubt, ACT. Decide. What kills overconfidence is overthinking.
